Drone safety information for planes and copters
Iris+ have several safety functions:
  • Fail-Safe overview
  • Fail-Safe Configurations
  • Battery failsafe
  • Geofence 100m altitude, 150m distance to pilot radius.

Follow the steps below to take off:

  1. Start the camera in USB waiting mode and connect the triggering cable
  2. Position the drone in the lunch position
  3. Test battery level
  4. turn on radio control win RTL off mode and LTR
  5. Connect Iris+ batteries
  6. Press safety button until is solid red
  7. Wait Iris+ for flashing Green light
  8. Arm motors holding left stick of radio control down-right until the motors spinn.
  9. Take off
  10. Turn radiuo control in Auto mode

During the flight

  1. Monitor time of flight
  2. Have a permanent view on the drone and be ready to take control or switch on RTL if needed

After landing

  1. Disarm motor, hold left stick down-right until motors stop spinning
  2. Detach Iris+ battery
  3. Turn off camera
